about.badge: A GIFT FROM FALLY TO HIS FANS
about.title: You Choose the
about.description: Fally Ipupa is making history by giving his fans unprecedented control. On May 2nd, 2026, at the legendary Stade de France, he'll perform the songs YOU choose. This isn't just a concert‚Äîit's a collaboration between the artist and his global fanbase. Your voice matters, and your votes will directly shape this unforgettable night.
about.feature1Desc: Stade de France, the legendary stadium that hosted World Cup finals and historic concerts
about.feature2Desc: Fally Ipupa is putting the power in your hands - the most voted songs will be performed live
about.feature3Desc: Join tens of thousands of fans for an unforgettable night of music and celebration
about.feature4Desc: Vote for your favorite songs and help create the ultimate setlist for this historic night
about.boxDescription: Fally Ipupa is giving his fans something rare and special: the power to decide what he performs at Stade de France. The top voted songs will make up the setlist, creating a once-in-a-lifetime concert tailored by the fans, for the fans. This is your opportunity to be part of music history alongside the legend himself.

voting.sectionDescription: Fally wants YOU to decide! Browse his complete discography, preview songs, and vote for what you want to hear live at Stade de France.
voting.sectionNote: The most voted songs will be performed on stage.
